tool_description: Zip Code ->  City , City -> Zip Code
name: Daddy: ZIP CODE - NICARAGUA
title: Daddy: ZIP CODE - NICARAGUA

api_list.name: City
api_list.description: Search zip code by City Name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daddy-zip-code-nicaragua.p.rapidapi.com/city"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daddy-zip-code-nicaragua.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
